name: Project 4
description:
Project 4 is a SciFi sidescroller shooter that was created by 4 students of the SAE Cologne within the scope of a project work in 4 weeks (Aug. 2017). Unfortunately the project was never continued and therefore only one level. I hope it still brings 3-4 min fun :)

There are some Bugs with mousecursor ingame, sorry for this!

Made by: Daniel Brück, Kevin Kopainski, Ricardo Parise, David Rakowski

Use WASD for movement and left mouse button for attack!
